hero.subtitle:
We build AI-powered software on top of the systems you already use.
Our goal is to eliminate inefficiencies and unlock powerful leverage
for your company's growth.

about.title: Don't let your competitors get ahead.
about.description: From AI Agents that automatically generate reports and optimize your planning to voice technology that keeps your CRM up-to-date - efficiency is becoming increasingly important today. We make sure you don't miss the train.

spotlight.title: FEATURED
spotlight.description: Your salespeople send a WhatsApp voice message with their client visit details - client name, quote amount, follow-up appointments - and everything is automatically placed in the right place in your CRM. This plug & play tool integrates with any CRM and takes only 3 minutes to install. More time for clients, less time on administration.

about.tagline: Your team deserves better tools. We build them.

footer.tagline: Smart AI solutions, tailored to your SME.

hero.title: Strategic Excellence
hero.description: Transforming digital ambitions into measurable business outcomes through methodical excellence and innovative engineering.

process.title: Our Proven Process
process.subtitle: A structured approach that ensures results

benefits.title: Why our process works
benefits.subtitle: Proven results through a structured approach, continuous collaboration and focus on measurable impact.

collaboration.title: True collaboration
collaboration.description: We don't work for you, but with you — your expertise combined with our technical knowledge for optimal results.

speed.title: Fast results
speed.description: Through our agile approach you see concrete progress quickly and can adjust in time for maximum impact.

impact.title: Measurable impact
impact.description: Every solution is built with clear KPIs and measurable improvements that demonstrate your ROI.

final.title: Ready for Excellence?
final.description: Transform your digital vision into measurable business impact. Your ambition deserves exceptional execution.

1.title: Problem Identification
1.subtitle: Discover & Analyze
1.description: We start with a thorough analysis of your current situation and identify the core challenges.
details: Analysis of existing systems and workflows
Identification of pain points and inefficiencies
1.usecase: A law firm struggles with quickly finding relevant legal information scattered across different documents and systems.

2.title: Solution Design
2.subtitle: Strategic Planning
2.description: Based on our findings, we design a custom solution that perfectly fits your needs.
2.usecase: We propose an AI-driven knowledge base that indexes all legal documents and makes them searchable via natural language.

3.title: Development
3.subtitle: Build & Integrate
3.description: Our experienced team builds your solution with the latest technologies and best practices.
3.usecase: We develop a RAG system that ingests documents, indexes them and provides an intuitive chat interface for legal queries.

4.title: Testing & Validation
4.subtitle: Quality Assurance
4.description: Extensive testing ensures your solution works perfectly before we go live.
4.usecase: We test search accuracy, user interface and security protocols with real legal cases.

5.title: Launch & Support
5.subtitle: Go Live & Grow
5.description: We launch your solution and provide continuous support for optimal performance.
5.usecase: The system is launched with training for all lawyers, and we monitor performance to further optimize.

essential.title: Essential (always active)
essential.description: Necessary to make the site work (security, load balancing, cookie preferences).

statistics.title: Statistics
